metadata.title: CVE-2024-55638 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Deserialization of Untrusted Data vulnerability in Drupal Core allowsObject Injection.This issue affects Drupal Core: from 7.0 before 7.102,from 8.0.0 before 10.2.11, from 10.3.0 before 10.3.9.

criterions.comment: drupal7 package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
